original_text: The tribe of Issachar will camp next to them. The leader of the people of Issachar is Nethanel son of Zuar.
korean_text: 그 곁에 진 칠 자는 잇사갈 지파라 잇사갈 자손의 지휘관은 수알의 아들 느다넬이요

sentences.original_text: The tribe of Issachar will camp next to them
sentences.korean_translation: 잇사갈 지파는 그들 곁에 진을 칠 것입니다

sentences.original_text: The leader of the people of Issachar is Nethanel
